requirements.description: Developers are prohibited from using the Vungle SDK, Vungle Platform, or any data obtained through these services in any way not explicitly allowed by the agreement.

type.summary: Limited Use of Vungle Services and Data

requirements.description: Developers must not permit third parties to use the Vungle SDK, Vungle Platform, or any data accessed through these services except as permitted in the agreement.

type.summary: Prohibition on Third-Party Use Beyond Agreement Scope

requirements.description: Developers are not allowed to use the Vungle SDK or Platform to re-identify individual end users.

type.summary: Prohibition on Re-identification of End Users
